str2: Faith, belief, trust, confidence; fidelity, faithfulness.
Abraham, progenitor of the Hebrew race. Of Hebrew origin; Abraham, the Hebrew patriarch.

str2: To try, tempt, test. From peira; to test, i.e. Endeavor, scrutinize, entice, discipline.

parse: Verb - Perfect Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: From pros and phero; to bear towards, i.e. Lead to, tender, treat.
(Hebrew), Isaac, the patriarch. Of Hebrew origin; Isaac, the son of Abraham.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Middle - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: To welcome, receive kindly; I undertake, assume the responsibility of. From ana and dechomai; to entertain.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
A promise. From epaggello; an announcement.

str2: From pros and phero; to bear towards, i.e. Lead to, tender, treat.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Only, only-begotten; unique. From monos and ginomai; only-born, i.e. Sole.
